pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Sproutling, 1 Clover, 1 of any small flower, 1 Gold Ingot, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 175 Sun value.

pages.title: 🏹 Snipers
pages.text: $(#25228d)Shoots very far. Hides when zombies are nearby.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Hides if a Zombie is 6 blocks near. Can target Flying Zombies.
$(br)$(#bd951a)You could say Shamrock is lucky, if your definition of “luck” includes “hiding whenever there’s anything dangerous or herbivorous around.” Which is a kind of luck, you must admit.
